description:
Whilst there's a lot of well maintained software out there in the FOSS world it's important to remember that a lot of it doesn't see much maintenance as such it's not too strange to see bugs pop up that really make no sense whatsoever

title: Linux Is A Castle Built On A Mountain Of Sand
